description.en: Quest Item: A Heart that contains the essence of the Heroes of the Past.
description.ar: Quest Item: A Heart that contains the essence of the Heroes of the Past.
description.br: (Quest) Um Coração que contém a essência dos Heróis do Passado.
description.cns: 打败守护兽‘贝纳卡度温’之后，获得的心脏
description.de: (Questitem) Das Herz von Venel, das du nach dem Kampf mit Venel Guardian erhältst.
description.fi: Quest Item: A Heart that contains the essence of the Heroes of the Past.
description.fil: Quest Item: A Heart that contains the essence of the Heroes of the Past.
description.fr: Cœur de Venel obtenu après avoir combattu ce gardien.
description.id: Item Quest: Hati yang berisi esensi dari Heroes of the Past.
description.it: Quest Item: A Heart that contains the essence of the Heroes of the Past.
description.jp: 英雄の試練を達成したことを示す、ヴェネルガーディアンの心臓にあたる宝石（クエストアイテム）
description.kr: 수호자의 몬스터 <베넬가디언>과의 대전에서 승리하였을 경우 획득할 수 있는 몬스터의 심장
description.nl: Quest Item: A Heart that contains the essence of the Heroes of the Past.
description.pl: Quest Item: A Heart that contains the essence of the Heroes of the Past.
description.ru: Ключевой предмет: сердце, в котором томится сущность героев прошлого.
description.sp: Objeto de Misión: Un corazón que contiene la esencia de los Héroes del Pasado.
description.sw: Quest Item: A Heart that contains the essence of the Heroes of the Past.
description.th: Quest Item: หัวใจที่บรรจุแก่นแท้ของวีรบุรุษแห่งอดีต
description.tw: [任務道具]一顆包含著過去英雄本質的心臟。
description.vi: Vật phẩm nhiệm vụ: Trái tim chứa đựng tinh hoa của các Anh hùng trong quá khứ.
